modules.name: Damonitu
modules.description: Generates arpeggios/melodies/(your noun here) based on euclidean rhythmic patterns and randomizable, or fixed, melodic patterns.

modules.name: Tezca
modules.description: Generates chord progressions using a simplistic approach of the Bartók axis system.

modules.name: Masino
modules.description: Yet another arpeggiator with useful features.
